name: Clorox Disinfecting All-Purpose Cleaner 32 Oz and Bathroom Cleaner, Household Essentials, 30 Oz, Pack of 3

product_description: This value pack of all-purpose and disinfecting bathroom cleaners gives you Clorox cleaning power without the bleach. Clorox Disinfecting All Purpose Cleaner kills 99.9% of bacteria and viruses* and is proven to kill the COVID-19 virus*, no bleach necessary. It prevents odor-causing bacteria growth on hard, nonporous surfaces. Great for everyday use, this Clorox spray can be used on many hard, non porous surfaces in your home. Reach for it to clean messes including grease, grime and soap scum. When it’s time to clean the bathroom, reach for Clorox Disinfecting Bathroom Cleaner. Use on tubs, glazed tile, toilet exteriors, sinks and counters. *All- Purpose Cleaner kills Escherichia coli O157:H7, Staphylococcus aureus (staph), Salmonella enterica (Salmonella); Influenza AVirus (Flu Virus); Bathroom Cleaner kills Staphylococcus aureus, Salmonella enterica, Influenza A Virus, Respiratory Syncytial Virus, Rhinovirus Type 37. Kills SARS-CoV-2 on hard, nonporous surfaces. Use as directed.

product_description: Lysol Power Bathroom Foamer cleaning spray fights against soap scum and limescale, and kills 99.9% of bathroom viruses and bacteria for a clean, fresh-smelling bathroom that shines. In only 30 seconds, this bathroom cleaner and shower cleaner sanitizes and fights soap scum throughout your entire bathroom: on shower doors, bathtubs, tiles, countertops, floors, and sinks. Soap scum and limescale are problems of the past, with far-reaching cleaning spray foam for a better clean. This surface cleaner is 100% bleach-free. Lysol offers a great range of top-rated products from our Lysol All-Purpose Cleaners, Lysol Disinfecting Sprays, and Lysol Toilet Bowl Cleaners, to specialized solutions for Lysol kitchen cleaner spray, Lysol bleach spray, and sink cleaner foam, we have your home covered. If you're tackling tough grime with our shower mold and mildew remover, sanitizing your space with air sanitizer room spray, an air freshener alternative, that’s tough on odors, Lysol delivers results. Don’t forget our Lysol Laundry Sanitizers for germ protection and our sanitizing wipes for convenient cleaning on the go.

short_description: - SET OF 2 BOTTLES, 1.2 LITERS EACH: This set includes two (2) bottles of bleach, with each containing 1.2 liters of the original concentrated formula – providing ample supply for all your cleaning and laundry needs.

- POWERFUL LAUNDRY BLEACH: This laundry bleach is specially formulated to give you the whitest whites, making your clothes look fresh and new. Trust bleach to maintain the brightness of your white laundry load after load.

- MULTI-PURPOSE BLEACH CLEANER: Aside from using this bleach for laundry, you can also rely on it as a multi-purpose bleach cleaner for your floors, sinks, showers, and toilets. It's designed to handle multiple cleaning tasks with ease.

product_description: Bleach, Original The Bleach is a versatile cleaning product designed to tackle tough stains and keep your whites brighter than ever. This 2-in-1 bleach is a powerhouse, ideal for both cleaning and laundry tasks. Cleaning & Laundry With its potent formula, Bleach is your ultimate multi-purpose bleach cleaner. Whether you're dealing with stains on white laundry, grime on floors, residue in sinks, soap scum in showers, or stubborn marks in toilets, Bleach is up to the challenge. It penetrates deep, lifting away dirt, grime, and bacteria, leaving surfaces sparkling clean and sanitized. Powerful Cleaner Bleach Not only does Bleach remove stains and clean surfaces, but it also disinfects, providing you with peace of mind knowing that your home is thoroughly sanitized. Plus, its powerful whitening action ensures that your whites stay brilliantly white, enhancing the overall appearance of your laundry. Great Value Pack Each set includes two (2) Bleach bottles, each containing 1.2 liters of the original bleach. This generous quantity ensures you have an ample supply on hand for all your cleaning and laundry needs.

product_description: Product Description Eliminate mold and mildew with Clorox Plus Tilex Mold and Mildew Remover. Powered with Clorox bleach, this cleaning spray not only removes unsightly mildew stains, but it also kills 99.9% of mold and mildew. A powerful multi-surface cleaner and mold remover, Clorox Plus Tilex Mold and Mildew Remover is a great addition to your bathroom cleaners. This mold cleaner tackles stains and odors on hard, nonporous surfaces, like glazed tile, tubs, shower doors, counters, sinks and more. Not for use only inside the house, this cleaner can also be used on cement pools, glazed pool tile, and outdoor vinyl or plastic patio furniture. To kill mold and mildew on hard, nonporous surfaces, simply spray the surface, wait five minutes, and rinse clean. No scrubbing is required. Mold and mildew are no match for Clorox Plus Tilex Mold and Mildew Remover. Manufacturer Contact Information Clorox
